markdownRemark.html: Located in the municipality of Mijas-Costa, near the Costa del Sol Racetrack. This 9-hole, par-35 golf course but is suitable to do on foot. it is a spectacular and technical field, with sea and mountain views and large greens that is suitable for players of all levels.

frontmatter.title: Cerrado del Águila Golf & Resort
frontmatter.description: Cerrado del Águila Golf & Resort - Located in the municipality of Mijas-Costa, near the Costa del Sol Racetrack. This 9-hole, par-35 golf course but is suitable to do on foot. it is a spectacular and technical field, with sea and mountain views and large greens that is suitable for players of all levels.
frontmatter.address: Camino de Acevedo s/n, 29649 Mijas-Costa Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 55.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 55.00 euros
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
